short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor web page, generate RSS feed & notifications on change detection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On server or cloud service, it is too complicated to configure if you monitor websites that need login.

Jiant.ing runs in browser extension, monitors ANY page easily and WYSIWYG in browser tabs. 

Features:

* Unlimited monitoring tasks and RSS feed generation for FREE.
* Automatically generate and host RSS feed & notifications for monitoring tasks.
* Free and easy to build task with various examples and templates that cover hot websites.
* Powerful and flexible to customize everything with your own script.
* Push instant notifications to Jiant.ing telegram bot for new updates.
* Translation automatic and free.
* Keywords inclusion/exclusion filter.
* Support custom AI integrations.
* Support custom proxies and user-agents for monitoring.
* Support tasks backup export & import.
* Support OPML export for RSS Reader.
* Support custom remote scripts for monitoring tasks.
* Reprocess existing RSS feed to new one with custom filters or translation.
* Merge multiple existing RSS feeds to new one with custom filter and translation.

Getting started:

1. Search example and template on extension index.
2. Click "Build your own" then parse and save task.
3. Click "Start" on extension navigation bar to keep all tasks monitoring.
4. Get RSS feed link for your RSS reader.
5. Connect & Enable Telegram bot notifications if you need it.

Guide & Documentation: https://jiant.ing/
Support Forum: https://www.reddit.com/r/jianting/
Support & Contact: contact@jiant.ing
